appDesc.description: A description of what the application does. This extension is used to...
appDesc.message: Quickly resolve digital object identifiers to their web destinations

autoLinkInfo.description: Cautionary remarks about the autolink feature
autoLinkInfo.message:
The autolink feature requires permission to access and modify pages you are viewing.
You will need to refresh open tabs for this option to take effect.

citeLocale.description: A label next to the locale chooser for formatted citations

citeLocaleLoadFailP1.description: Failure message when locale.xml retrieval fails (first part)

citeLocaleLoadFailP2.description: Failure message when locale.xml retrieval fails (second part)

citeStyle.description: A label next to the style chooser for formatted citations

citeStyleFilterLabel.description: The label for the style filter box on the Citations page

citeStyleGenFail.description: General failure message for citation generation

citeStyleLoadFailP1.description: Failure message when style.csl retrieval fails (first part)

citeStyleLoadFailP2.description: Failure message when style.csl retrieval fails (second part)

citeSubHeading.description: Subheading message on the citation generator page
citeSubHeading.message: Generate a formatted citation for a DOI

citeSubmit.description: The text that appears on the button to start the citation generator

citeTitle.description: The title on the citation generator page

contextText.description: When a user highlights a DOI on a webpage and right clicks on the highlighted text, this entry appears in the context menu to resolve the DOI

doiOutputUrlExample.description: Label for the currently set resolver URL

iconHover.description: The tooltip message displayed to a user when the mouse hovers on the extension's icon

invalidDoiAlert.description: A warning presented to user if the DOI code is not valid

invalidQrSizeAlert.description: A warning presented to user if the QR image size entered is too large or too small

loading.description: A temporary message while resources load

needCitationPerm.description: A notice to the user that additional permissions must be accepted for the citation generator to work
needCitationPerm.message: Citations are retrieved from crossref.org, datacite.org, and doi.org. These permissions must be accepted before the generator will function.

noCitationFound.description: A notice to the user that a citation could not be found

optionAutoLink.description: A setting to enable the extension to scan every page visited by the user and convert DOI codes into clickable links.
optionAutoLink.message: Automatically turn DOI codes on web pages into links

optionAutolinkApplyto.description: Label for selection of protocols where autolink should be applied
optionAutolinkApplyto.message: ↪ Apply autolink feature to pages with protocol(s):

optionAutoLinkRewrite.description: A setting to enable the extension to scan every page visited by the user and rewite dx.doi.org liks to be handled by the custom DOI resolver instead.
optionAutoLinkRewrite.message: Rewrite existing dx.doi.org links to use the Custom DOI Resolver

optionContextMenu.description: A setting to enable a feature where a user can highlight a DOI on a webpage, and then right click the selected text to see a 'Resolve DOI' in the context menu
optionContextMenu.message: Enable right-click context menu for selected text

optionCrAutolink.description: Label to choose whether custom resolver is enabled for autolinker

optionCrBubble.description: Label to choose whether custom resolver is enabled for bubble

optionCrContext.description: Label to choose whether custom resolver is enabled for context menu

optionCrLabelBubble.description: Label for choice of custom or default resolver in bubble

optionCrOmnibox.description: Label to choose whether custom resolver is enabled for omnibox

optionCustomResolver.description: A setting to enable custom entry of DOI and ShortDOI resolvers

optionCustomResolverSelection.description: Settings to allow choice of default or custom resolver

optionMetaButtons.description: A setting to enable additional buttons in the popup

optionOmniboxOpento.description: Label for selectable option to open omnibox queries in current or new tab
optionOmniboxOpento.message: Omnibox entry should by default open result in:

optionSyncData.message: Synchronize this extension's settings across Chrome installations

optionsDescription.description: Notice about external services used by the extension and where to submit bug reports
optionsDescription.message: This extension uses dx.doi.org, datacite.org, and crossref.org to resolve links and obtain metadata.

optionsSubmit.description: The text that appears on the button to open the Options page

qrBgColorInputLabel.description: The label for the background color text box on the QR page

qrBgTransLabel.description: The label for the transparent background check box on the QR page

qrDisabled.description: A notice that QR title retrieval is not enabled

qrFetchTitleLabel.description: A setting to fetch the title of the reference in a generated QR code.
qrFetchTitleLabel.message: Fetch title of reference for QR code

qrFgColorInputLabel.description: The label for the foreground color text box on the QR page

qrManualTitleLabel.description: The label for the manual title check box on the QR page

qrManualTitleTextLabel.description: The label for the manual title text box on the QR page

qrMessageEncoded.description: Label for message encoded in QR code

qrSave.description: Instructions on how to save QR image
qrSave.message: Click on the image to save it

qrSizeInputLabel.description: A label for the size text box on the QR page

qrSubHeading.description: Subheading message on the QR generator page
qrSubHeading.message: Generate a QR code that can be scanned by smartphones and links directly to a DOI destination

qrTitleFailure.description: Failing status of title retrieval for QR encoding

qrTitleStatus.description: Label for status of title retrieval for QR encoding

qrTitleSuccess.description: Successful status of title retrieval for QR encoding

resolveSubmit.description: The text that appears on the button to submit a DOI code for resolving

syncDataInfo.message: You must have Chrome Sync enabled for this feature to work correctly. This option should be manually enabled on each Chrome installation where you would like sync to occur. The following options are not included in sync because they require permissions to be accepted by the user before enabling: Autolink, QR title fetch.

syncDataWipeDescription.message: ↪ Wipe all synced data and disable Sync

textDoiResolverInput.description: Label for text box where a URL will be entered for DOIs

textShortDoiResolverInput.description: Label for text box where a URL will be entered for ShortDOIs
